title: (Shop) Literally unusable
body:
Riot,I've been looking around in the new shop to buy a new champion with the newly gathered IP i had,and my eye caught Kindred,since she seems rather strong at the moment and is very fun.

Then I clicked on her in the shop,preparing to throw 6300 hard earned IP through many normal game loses and bot games,then I noticed something...

http://imgur.com/2GE51Nc

RIOT HOW COULD YOU DO THIS? THIS...THIS IS JUST BLASPHEMY! KINDRED AREN'T NIGHT HUNTERS! HOW COULD YOU MISTAKE VAYNE FOR THEM?

.

.

.


.

Thanks.Hope it gets fixed soon.

Yours truly,a guy on the internet with too much free time.
